examples.example: 我曾经见过那美丽的彩虹横跨天际，真是太震撼了。

translate.english: I once saw that beautiful rainbow spanning the sky, it was really so shocking.

examples.example: 我见过最璀璨的星空，那壮丽的景象让我难以忘怀。

translate.english: I have seen the most brilliant starry sky, and that magnificent sight makes me unforgettable.

examples.example: 我见过祖国的大好河山，心中满是对这片土地的热爱和自豪。

translate.english: I have seen the great rivers and mountains of the motherland, and my heart is full of love and pride for this land.
